examples.example: 我很愿意听取别人不同的看法，这有助于我开阔视野。

translate.english: I am very willing to listen to different views of others, which helps me broaden my horizons.

examples.example: 我对于这件事有自己独特的看法，并且相信通过努力可以让结果变得更好。

translate.english: I have my own unique view on this matter and believe that through hard work the result can be made better.

examples.example: 我对未来充满了积极的看法，相信一切都会越来越好。

translate.english: I am full of positive views about the future and believe that everything will get better and better.
